name: Have A Drink
description:
Game made for NYU Game Center's Prototype Studio class.

The creative prompt this week was "Make the game that would prevent your younger self from making your mistakes"--or something like that.

I chose to address the drinking problem that plagued me from 2009-2012... and possibly until the present.

Music: "When You Sleep" by My Bloody Valentine

3D player model from Mixamo.
